body_html:
I want exactly the same as @abred. With Tensorflow 0.11, I produced an image summary with matplotlib. At each epoch the image was overwritten.
Now, with Tensorflow 1.1, the plots are kept for every epochs! I only need the plot for the last epoch.

Plotting the training error and the test error in the same plot is a very common thing to do! Do people using Tensorboard give up on that?

body:
I want exactly the same as @abred. With Tensorflow 0.11, I produced an image summary with matplotlib. At each epoch the image was overwritten.
Now, with Tensorflow 1.1, the plots are kept for every epochs! I only need the plot for the last epoch.

Plotting the training error and the test error in the same plot is a very common thing to do! Do people using Tensorboard give up on that?
